title: DEVELOPING STORY: ESA DeOrbits Aeolus Spacecraft, Concluding 5 Year Mission
summary: After a highly successful mission, ESA has deorbited the Aeolus's spacecraft, bring to an end the groundbreaking 5 year mission studying Earth's weather and climate monitoring.

title: Sierra Space wins Air Force contract for upper-stage engine development
summary: Sierra Space won an Air Force contract to continue development of an engine that could be used in the upper stage of future launch vehicles.

title: L3Harris Acquires Aerojet Rocketdyne
summary: L3Harris has cleared all regulatory approvals and officially acquired Aerojet Rocketdyne, the last independent US missle propulsion system supplier.

title: Argentina 28th Country To Sign Artemis Accords
summary: Argentina is the 28th country to sign the US led Artemis Accords which outline the best practices for space exploration.

title: NASA Awards Administrative & Technical Support Services Contract
summary: NASA has selected PCI Productions (PCIP), LLC, of Huntsville, Alabama, to provide technical and administrative services in support of directorates, programs, and offices at NASA Armstrong Flight Research Center in Edwards, California, and NASA Ames Research Center in Mountain View, California.

title: ULA has concerns about a third competitor in national security space launch
summary: Bruno says he has questions on the Space Force’s decision to add a third heavy-lift launch provider in the next round of contracts, known as National Security Space Launch Phase 3.

title: Aerojet Rocketdyne officially becomes part of L3Harris
summary: Chris Kubasik, CEO of defense contractor L3Harris Technologies, on July 27 extended “a warm welcome to Aerojet's team of over 5,000 employees who will soon become part of L3Harris.”

title: BREAKING! STARSHIP IFT-1 Launch WB-57 Footage Released
summary: TLP Network via a NASA FOIA has acquired 2 of 5 videos recored by NASA WB-57 during the Starship IFT-1 flight.

title: NASA temporarily loses contact with one of its most distant spacecraft
summary: The Voyagers were launched nearly half a century ago.

title: BREAKING! NASA Looses Contact With Voyager 2
summary: NASA's Voyager 2 spacecraft has encountered a communication break due to a series of planned commands sent to it on July 21.
